ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] EQ then and now
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed.

Zuki Vekk wrote:

> >So, if you come
> >up with any "gee, I really wish EQ did this" you want to pass along, I'm
> >open to suggestions.
>
> I'll tell you one thing I'd like EQ to do--more consistent reward questing with decent loot items. Not that, mind you, there aren't any quests (few and far between) that reward with decent items for long and arduous work, but the majority of them seem to me to be unbalanced.
>
> It's not the long and arduous work I mind, that's the fun and the adventure part of it. It's the dinky little item you get for completing a storyline quest. And, it seems to me, as I get older in levels, the good quests get fewer and fewer.
>
> EQ Wish List Item #1:
> Decent Questing=Decent Rewarding
>
> Zuki
>
> Angelfire for your free web-based e-mail. http://www.angelfire.com
